name: HIP HOP DNA Play
description:
HIP HOP DNA is a game that highlights the foundations of hip-hop through trivia.

The play can choose any hip-hop category and will be given 15 seconds to answer the question. Each question is worth a different amount based on the difficulty and how often the question has been asked.

At the end of the game you can see your score.

You can replay the game as often as you like to improve your score.
